column1: Local Foods////We ordered the crispy chicken sandwich
column3: kale and qunioa. Every single thing we ordered was 5 stars! The crispy chicken sandwich was not fried
column4: it was crispy because of the yummy pretzel bun! I loved all the toppings on the sandwich
column5: especially the pickles! The lemongrass soup had a yummy
column7: coconut milk tasting broth that was fab! The sides were surprisingly just as good as the soup and sandwich! Who knew kale and qunioa could taste so good! We will definitely be back!
